info.description: This is a lunch wallet server.
info.title: Lunch Wallet Swagger API

get.description: Admin gets to see all blocked users with this endpoint. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN
get.summary: This endpoint enables admin to see all blocked users

post.description: creates meal by collecting fields in models.Food in a form data. Note: "images" is a file to be uploaded in jpeg or png. "name" is the name of the meal, "type" is either brunch or dinner, "weekday" can be ignored but it is either monday - sunday, "kitchen" is either uno, edo-tech park, etc. "year", "month" and "day" are numbers. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN

parameters.description: images, type, name, kitchen, year, month, day
parameters.name: data

delete.description: Delete meal by clicking on the particular food. The id of each food is attached to the link/endpoint. When you click on the food to be deleted, the id is gotten from the link/endpoint and the food is deleted. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN

get.description: Admin gets to see the profile information of a food beneficiary. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN
get.summary: Gets profile of a food beneficiary

get.description: Admin gets to see how manuy beneficiaries blocked. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN

put.description: Update meal by clicking on the particular food. The id of each food is attached to the link/endpoint. When you click on the food to be updated, the id is gotten from the link/endpoint. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN

post.description: This is used to tell if a food beneficiary has scanned the QR code previously or not,it then logs the information .
post.summary: Logs meal records in the database after successful QR code scan

put.description: Change dinner food status by kitchen staff from NOT SERVING to either SERVED or SERVING
Change brunch food status by kitchen staff from NOT SERVING to either SERVED or SERVING

get.description: This should be used to get the food in the database to generate QR code meant for the day.
get.summary: Gets the food in the database required to generate QR code

get.description: Kitchen staff gets the timetable for brunch for a particular date. It is an authorized route to only KITCHEN STAFF
Kitchen staff gets the timetable for dinner for a particular date. It is an authorized route to only KITCHEN STAFF
Kitchen staff gets total number of food beneficiaries. It is an authorized route to only KITCHEN STAFF
get.summary: Get total number of food beneficiaries

get.description: Kitchen staff gets list of food beneficiaries. It is an authorized route to only KITCHEN STAFF

delete.description: Admin deletes/removes a food beneficiary from the dashboard. It is an authorized route to only ADMIN

get.description: Kitchen staff can search for a food beneficiary by name, location or stack. It is an authorized route to only KITCHEN STAFF

post.description: Allows Admin to log in in order to use app dashboard. Admin must be active before he or she can log in

get.description: This should be used to get all the food in the database meant for today. This should be used instead of GetBrunch and GetDinner seperately for scalability purpose when rendering on the Beneficiary dashboard. Frontend can seperate dinner and brunch.
get.summary: Gets all the food in the database using the date of the present day

post.description: Allows Food Beneficiary to log in in order to use app dashboard. Beneficiary must be active before he or she can log in

get.description: Gets all the brunch in the database meant for today. GetAllFood should be used instead for scalability purpose when rendering on the Beneficiary dashboard. Frontend can filter brunch and dinner.
get.summary: Gets all the brunch in the database using the date of the present day

get.description: Gets all the dinner in the database meant for today. GetAllFood should be used instead for scalability purpose when rendering on the Beneficiary dashboard. Frontend can filter brunch and dinner.
get.summary: Gets all the dinner in the database using the date of the present day

post.description: Allows Kitchen staff to log in in order to use app dashboard. Staff must be active before he or she can log in

get.description: Returns all notifications in the database and their dates to be rendered as will by the frontend
get.summary: Notifies users whenever there is a change worthy of notification
